org.sql: SELECT roles.* FROM roles INNER JOIN users_roles ON roles.id = users_roles.role_id WHERE users_roles.user_id = "$1" AND roles.name = 'creator' AND roles.resource_type IS NULL AND roles.resource_id IS NULL

rewrites.sql: SELECT roles.* FROM roles WHERE roles.name = 'creator' AND roles.resource_type IS NULL AND roles.resource_id IS NULL
